document.full_text: deutsche bank  chief executive josef ackermann will appear in a munich court on thursday to testify in one of the lawsuits brought against the bank by fallen german media mogul leo kirch.
document.title: deutsche bank ceo to appear in court in kirch case
lines_and_colors: deutsche bank  chief executive josef ackermann will appear in a munich court on thursday to testify in one of the lawsuits brought against the bank by fallen german media mogul leo kirch.
